text: By far the best sushi in the neighborhood! Service is also excellent. This is my go-to place for raw fish cravings!
Thanks to chef Mike Ha ,we had a great sushi nite at his new restaurant.The place is clean,big and trendy.Come and check it out when you come to Montreal
Bonne place pour manger des sushis frais des pokes mais personellement j'aime pas les lumieres neon de la place. Bon service , grandes fenetres.
